input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='CRAFTD 4MM Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='Figaro Link Chain - 5mm, Size 20", 14K White Gold Plated - The GLD Shop'
  - Name='GLD 14K White Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='18K Yellow Gold Palm Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='GLD 14K White Micro Diamond Prong Cuban Necklace'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Black Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Crucifix Silver Pendant Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Chain Stack'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a Cuban Link Chain but 4mm gauge, smaller thickness and lacks mention of silver or stainless steel, so somewhat relevant but different size and possible material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Figaro Link Chain - 5mm, Size 20", 14K White Gold Plated - The GLD Shop
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different link style (Figaro vs Cuban), smaller gauge (5mm), plated gold not silver or stainless steel, making it moderately less relevant.
Cuban link chain, similar style and material in white gold (close to silver tone), likely similar function; gauge not specified but close relevance.
Different chain style (palm link), yellow gold material; very different style and material from the silver Cuban link.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link style, slightly larger gauge (10mm) and gold with iced out style; related but different size and finish.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GLD 14K White Micro Diamond Prong Cuban Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link style with white gold and added diamonds; more embellished but still related chain style and material tone.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, includes 8mm size, Cuban link style; gold and iced out finish differ from silver but very relevant in style and size.
Same brand and chain style but it's a bracelet, not a chain necklace, so less relevant in product type linked to necklace.
Same brand and size (8mm), Cuban link style; black finish differs but core product is very close in size, style, and type.
Same brand and silver chain with pendant; likely similar chain style but presence of pendant and unspecified gauge reduces exact relevance.
Same brand, sizes 8mm and 10mm, Cuban link style; iced out finish differs from plain silver but otherwise very relevant.
Same brand and Cuban style but likely a stack of multiple chains or bracelets; less specificity about gauge and single chain product reduces relevance.
